name: Real Manager
description:
Introducing – The Official Fantasy Soccer game!

Did you always think you can manage a Real Soccer team with Real Players and a Real Budget and be the best manager in your country?
Well, now it’s OFFICIAL - In Real Manager you can!

Wait no more and take part in the most advanced fantasy football game there is!
Show the world and your friends what you can do with real life players and a big budget:

JOIN THE OFFICIAL GAME IN 4 COUNTRIES AND START YOUR JOURNEY TO THE WORLD CLASS MANAGER TITLE

• Pick your team’s name and branding.
• Build the best Fantasy Soccer Dream Team from real life players.
• Train your players by signing the right coaches and assign training sessions to improve your players abilities to gain more points.
• Invite and challenge your friends and family for weekly competitions.
• Collect incomes from your sponsors and hourly rewards.
• Compete in the global ranking of the best Real Manager.

Don’t just watch soccer– Take a part in Real Manager’s community on social media networks at Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, and stay up to date on all the latest news, features and tips.

It’s your time to be more than just a fan – Start your Fantasy Football carrier today and enhance your sports experience.

Have a problem or a suggestion? We want you to tell us.
Feel free to share with us at:
http://www.funatix.club/#contact
